data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Bilbao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, Jaime Mata gets his shot on target but fails to score for Getafe.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a Bilbao throw-in in Getafe's half.
Mikel Vesga (Bilbao) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 4, In Getafe a free kick has been awarded the away team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Getafe.
Throw-in for Bilbao in the half of Getafe.
In the minute 6, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Mario Melero Lopez awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Getafe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 7, Bilbao to take a throw-in in Getafe territory.
Can Bilbao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Getafe's half?
Throw-in Bilbao.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Bilbao in the half of Getafe.
Bilbao have been awarded a corner by Mario Melero Lopez.
Goal! Bilbao take a 0-1 lead through a well-placed header from Asier Villalibre.
In the minute 9, Alex Berenguer with an assist there.
Throw-in for Bilbao in their own half.
Throw-in for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
In the minute 11, Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Getafe.
Goal kick for Bilbao at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
Bilbao to take a throw-in in Getafe territory.
In the minute 14, Ander Capa is booked for the away team.
Free kick Getafe.
In Getafe Getafe attack through Angel Rodriguez. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 15, Ball goes out of play for a Bilbao goal kick.
Bilbao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Getafe in the half of Bilbao.
In the minute 17, Mario Melero Lopez awards Bilbao a goal kick.
Throw-in for Getafe in the half of Bilbao.
Bilbao have a goal kick.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Bilbao in their own half.
Jaime Mata for Getafe is whistled offside.
Throw-in Getafe.
In the minute 21, Mario Melero Lopez awards the home team a throw-in.
Getafe drives forward and Cucho Hernandez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball safe as Bilbao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 23, Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
Getafe's Chema gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Bilbao at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
In the minute 25, Mario Melero Lopez signals a Getafe throw-in in Bilbao's half.
Throw-in for Bilbao in their own half.
Bilbao push upfield but Mario Melero Lopez quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 27, Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Getafe.
Corner awarded to Getafe.
Corner awarded to Getafe.
In the minute 29, Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
Can Bilbao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Getafe's half?
Mikel Vesga for Bilbao drives towards goal at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Getafe in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Bilbao awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
Throw-in for Bilbao in the half of Getafe.
Free kick Bilbao.
In the minute 35, In Getafe a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Inigo Martinez for Bilbao gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Getafe have a goal kick.
In the minute 36, Getafe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Getafe in their own half.
In Getafe a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 38, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Getafe just outside Bilbao's area.
In Getafe, Damian Suarez of Getafe is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 40, Getafe are pushing forward but Mauro Arambarri's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Bilbao goal kick.
Can Bilbao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Getafe's half?
In the minute 41, Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Bilbao.
Throw-in for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a throw-in for Bilbao, close to Getafe's area.
In the minute 43, Mario Melero Lopez awards Getafe a goal kick.
Bilbao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
In the minute 45, Getafe awarded a free kick in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Getafe.
Mauro Arambarri (Getafe) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
In the minute 46, The home team have replaced David Timor with Erick Cabaco. This is the first substitution made today by Pepe Bordalas.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Getafe.
In the minute 48, Free kick for Getafe in the half of Bilbao.
At Coliseum Alfonso Pérez, Mikel Vesga has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Yuri Berchiche for Bilbao who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 49, Yuri Berchiche (Bilbao) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Mikel Balenziaga.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a Bilbao throw-in in Getafe's half.
Throw-in Bilbao.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Getafe in their own half.
Free kick Bilbao.
Ball safe as Getafe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 56, Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Getafe.
Goal kick for Bilbao at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
Bilbao to take a throw-in in Getafe territory.
In the minute 59, Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
Throw-in for Bilbao in their own half.
In Getafe a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 60, Getafe's Mauro Arambarri breaks free at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Bilbao goal kick.
Bilbao have been awarded a corner by Mario Melero Lopez.
In the minute 61, Cucho Hernandez (Getafe) gets a yellow card.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Bilbao in their own half.
Mario Melero Lopez waits before resuming play because Yeray Alvarez for Bilbao is still down.
In the minute 63, Bilbao's Yeray Alvarez is back in action after a slight knock.
Mario Melero Lopez awards the home team a throw-in.
Alex Berenguer for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 64, Mario Melero Lopez signals a Getafe throw-in in Bilbao's half.
Bilbao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Getafe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bilbao's half?
In the minute 66, Getafe needs to be cautious. Bilbao have an attacking throw-in.
Getafe are whistled for offside.
Getafe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 69, Getafe to take a throw-in in Bilbao territory.
Free kick for Bilbao in their own half.
Throw-in for Getafe in the half of Bilbao.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Getafe close to the penalty box.
Getafe have been awarded a corner by Mario Melero Lopez.
Erick Cabaco for Getafe has been booked by Mario Melero Lopez and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 72, Gaizka Garitano (Bilbao) is making a second substitution, with Oihan Sancet replacing Iker Muniain.
Raul Garcia is replacing Inaki Williams for Bilbao at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
Bilbao have a goal kick.
In the minute 75, Getafe make their second substitution with Francisco Portillo replacing Jaime Mata.
Goal! Getafe go level at 1-1 through Angel Rodriguez in Getafe.
That's a fine assist from Cucho Hernandez.
In the minute 77, Free kick Getafe.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Getafe.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 79, Gaizka Garitano is making the team's fourth substitution at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez with Jon Morcillo replacing Alex Berenguer.
In Getafe, Getafe push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 80, Throw-in Getafe.
Gaizka Garitano is making the team's fifth substitution at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez with Oscar De Marcos replacing Ander Capa.
Ball safe as Bilbao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Bilbao in their own half.
In the minute 84, Damian Suarez is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 85, Mario Melero Lopez awards Getafe a goal kick.
Pepe Bordalas (Getafe) is making a third change, with Allan Nyom replacing the possibly injured Damian Suarez.
Enes Ünal is replacing Cucho Hernandez for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Bilbao in their own half.
Free kick for Getafe in their own half.
In the minute 87, Bilbao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jon Morcillo (Bilbao) has received a yellow card from Mario Melero Lopez.
Inigo Martinez (Bilbao) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 89, Getafe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bilbao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mario Melero Lopez awards Bilbao a goal kick.
Can Bilbao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Getafe's half?
Free kick for Bilbao in the half of Getafe.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball goes out of play for a Getafe goal kick.
In Getafe a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
